actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to prohibit certain issuers of securities from falsifying their books and records, and for related purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Exchange Act to require specified issuers of securities to make and keep books, records, and accounts, and to devise and maintain an adequate system of internal accounting controls. Makes it unlawful to directly or indirectly falsify any book, record, or document of any issuer of a specified class.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to prohibit certain issuers of securities from falsifying their books and records, and for related purposes.
